===Overview===
The '''Spider-Clan ''' is a [[Homo sapiens|human]] hunter-gatherer society based in the [[Nazca]], [[Peru]].{{r|Spider-Man Annual #2001}}

They were descendants of [[Gaea (Earth-616)|Gaea]].{{r|Thor & Hercules: Encyclopaedia Mythologica #1|; [[Gaea (Earth-616)|Gaea]]'s entry}}
